item.content:encoded: At least five games released under the Warner Bros. Discovery publishing label Cartoon Network Games have been delisted from digital stores, including Steam and the Nintendo eShop, seemingly never to return. item.description: More detail on the Cycle Length Lemma, a basic result in the theory of random permutations. We prove a categorified version of this result, which is an equivalence of groupoids, and then derive the or...
item.content:encoded: More detail on the Cycle Length Lemma, a basic result in the theory of random permutations. We prove a categorified version of this result, which is an equivalence of groupoids, and then derive the original version by taking groupoid cardinalities.
